name: juicebox
description: SQL     - How to connect to PostgreSQL from the command line     - Basic PostgreSQL commands like \c, \d     - The basics of creating/dropping an entire database     - The basics of creating/dropping a table     - Basic data types     - What a primary key is     - What a foreign key is     - How to insert data into a database     - How to retrieve data from a database     - How to update data in a database     - How to join related tables into one mega-table
